paragraph.paragraph:
The once view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_format_onces_color.gif displays all the
./55_routines_format.xml routines declared as once and the constant
./50_attributes_format.xml attributes in the current class (or in its
./30_ancestors_format.xml ancestors. ). It is available through the Class tab of the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml context tool .
